verses.verse: And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, even the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%>, came <S%H935><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin <S%H6790><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>: and the people <S%H5971><s%> abode <S%H3427><s%> in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>; and Miriam <S%H4813><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> there <S%H6912><s%>, and was buried there.
And there was no water <S%H4325><s%> for the congregation <S%H5712><s%>: and they assembled <S%H6950><s%> themselves together against Moses <S%H4872><s%> and against Aaron <S%H175><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> strove <S%H7378><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%>, and spake <S%H559><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Would that <S%H3863><s%> we had died <S%H1478><s%> when our brethren <S%H251><s%> died <S%H1478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>!
And why have ye brought <S%H935><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> into this wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, that we should die <S%H4191><s%> there <S%H1165><s%>, we and our beasts?

And wherefore have ye made us to come up <S%H5927><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> us in unto this evil <S%H7451><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>? it is no place <S%H4725><s%> of seed <S%H2233><s%>, or of figs <S%H8384><s%>, or of vines <S%H1612><s%>, or of pomegranates <S%H7416><s%>; neither is there any water <S%H4325><s%> to drink <S%H8354><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H935><s%> from the presence <S%H6440><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and fell <S%H5307><s%> upon their faces <S%H6440><s%>: and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> appeared unto them <S%H7200><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H3947><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%>, and assemble <S%H6950><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, thou <S%H175><s%>, and Aaron thy brother <S%H251><s%>, and speak <S%H1696><s%> ye unto the rock <S%H5553><s%> before their eyes <S%H5869><s%>, that it give forth <S%H5414><s%> its water <S%H4325><s%>; and thou shalt bring forth <S%H5414><s%> to them water <S%H4325><s%> out <S%H3318><s%> of the rock <S%H5553><s%>; so thou shalt give <S%H8248><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> and their cattle drink <S%H8248><s%>.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, as he commanded him <S%H6680><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> gathered <S%H6950><s%> the assembly <S%H6951><s%> together before <S%H6440><s%> the rock <S%H5553><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8085><s%>, Hear now <S%H4784><s%>, ye rebels; shall we bring <S%H3318><s%> you forth water <S%H4325><s%> out of this rock <S%H5553><s%>?

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> lifted up <S%H7311><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and smote <S%H5221><s%> the rock <S%H5553><s%> with his rod <S%H4294><s%> twice <S%H6471><s%>: and water <S%H4325><s%> came forth <S%H3318><s%> abundantly <S%H7227><s%>, and the congregation <S%H5712><s%> drank <S%H8354><s%>, and their cattle <S%H1165><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Because ye believed <S%H539><s%> not in me <S%H6942><s%>, to sanctify me in the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, therefore ye shall not bring <S%H935><s%> this assembly <S%H6951><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given them <S%H5414><s%>.

These are <S%H1992><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah <S%H4809><s%>; because the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> strove <S%H7378><s%> with Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and he was sanctified in them <S%H6942><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> from Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%>, Thou knowest <S%H3045><s%> all the travail <S%H8513><s%> that hath befallen us <S%H4672><s%>:

how our fathers <S%H1><s%> went down <S%H3381><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and we dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%>; and the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> dealt ill <S%H7489><s%> with us <S%H1><s%>, and our fathers:

and when we cried <S%H6817><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, he heard <S%H8085><s%> our voice <S%H6963><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%>, and brought us forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and <S%H6946><s%>, behold, we are in Kadesh, a city <S%H5892><s%> in the uttermost <S%H7097><s%> of thy border <S%H1366><s%>.

Let us pass <S%H5674><s%>, I pray thee <S%H776><s%>, through thy land: we will not pass <S%H5674><s%> through field <S%H7704><s%> or through vineyard <S%H3754><s%>, neither will we drink <S%H8354><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the wells <S%H875><s%>: we will go <S%H3212><s%> along the king <S%H4428><s%>'s highway <S%H1870><s%>; we will not turn <S%H5186><s%> aside to the right hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left <S%H8040><s%>, until we have passed <S%H5674><s%> thy border <S%H1366><s%>.
And Edom <S%H123><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5674><s%>, Thou shalt not pass through me <S%H3318><s%>, lest I come out with the sword <S%H2719><s%> against thee <S%H7125><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H5927><s%>, We will go up by the highway <S%H4546><s%>; and if we drink <S%H8354><s%> of thy water <S%H4325><s%>, I and my cattle <S%H4735><s%>, then will I give <S%H5414><s%> the price thereof <S%H1697><s%>: let me only, without doing anything else <S%H5674><s%>, pass through on my feet <S%H7272><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Thou shalt not pass through <S%H5674><s%>. And Edom <S%H123><s%> came out <S%H3318><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> him with much <S%H3515><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>, and with a strong <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Thus Edom <S%H123><s%> refused <S%H3985><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> passage <S%H5674><s%> through his border <S%H1366><s%>: wherefore Israel <S%H3478><s%> turned away from him <S%H5186><s%>.

And they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> from Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>: and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, even the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%>, came <S%H935><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>, by the border <S%H1366><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Edom <S%H123><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> unto his people <S%H5971><s%>; for he shall not enter <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, because ye rebelled against <S%H4784><s%> my word <S%H6310><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah <S%H4809><s%>.
Take <S%H3947><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and bring them up <S%H5927><s%> unto mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%>;

and strip <S%H6584><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> of his garments <S%H899><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> them upon Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>: and Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> unto his people <S%H4191><s%>, and shall die there.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%>: and they went up <S%H5927><s%> into mount <S%H2022><s%> Hor <S%H2023><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the congregation <S%H5712><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stripped <S%H6584><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> of his garments <S%H899><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> them upon Eleazar <S%H499><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> there on the top <S%H7218><s%> of the mount <S%H2022><s%>: and Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> came down <S%H3381><s%> from the mount <S%H2022><s%>.

And when all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Aaron <S%H175><s%> was dead <S%H1478><s%>, they wept <S%H1058><s%> for Aaron <S%H175><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, even all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
